nodes.text: Imperial Advisor Kren Blista-Vanee maintained a lavish reception hall on the Imperial capital of Coruscant during the Galactic Civil War, where he once held a gala for Imperial Center's elite society to commemorate that season's opening-night performance of The Kallea Cycle, a Brentaal opera. The reception hall was adorned with Blista-Vanee's art collection and 30-meter-tall transparisteel windows, which served as walls, offering an amazing view of the Coruscant skyline.
